Name: patter warrior
About the game: This is a first person shooting game，The player plays a special soldier in a small town full of enemies，Players are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can kill the enemy or avoid the enemy's attack, and try to keep their health value alive for a long time. Control keys: Right-click targeting WASD movement The left Shift running Left mouse button attack Space leaping The left Ctrl squats Mouse control direction R Loaded Weapons G the bomb F Pick up weapon Middle mouse button switch weapons
